name: Thrown towards unreality
description:
Controls:

  • W or up arrow key to jump
  • A and D or left and right arrow keys to move
  • Left click to shoot the discovery bullets
  • Right click to shoot bombs (unlockable)
  • Space to open the map (unlockable) and the menu
  • S or down arrow key to dash (unlockable)

In Thrown towards unreality, your best friend betrays you and she throws you down the hole, also she loses her magic arrow. Then, when you have just landed on the ground, you get that and you get the ability of shooting the discovery bullets, that have an area in which you can see the real zone.

From this point, you will have to use the magic arrow, your basic abilities and others that you will find in the different zones, to return back to where she threw you towards the unreal map, and fight with her.
